page.title: 10A day at school continued.
page.content: The teachers play the piano and sometimes girls play the recorders.After assembly we have maths groups with Mr.Denton.Then we have first play for 15 minutes.Then we had drama about Red Indians. It is then dinner time. We have dinner in the canteen.At 1.30 we wrote this story until last play at 2.40.After last play we go into Mrs.Robinson's class to make an Indian picture from felt and wool.On the picture are totem poles, teepees, bows and arrows, Red Indians, trees and an Indian in a canoe on a lake.
